list.heading: Education
list.decscription: Schools, colleges, and universities need accessible digital platforms to ensure that students of all abilities can access educational content, resources, and services.

list.heading: Healthcare
list.decscription: Hospitals, clinics, and healthcare providers must provide accessible websites and mobile apps to ensure that all patients, including those with disabilities, can access medical information and services.

list.heading: Government
list.decscription: Government agencies need to comply with legal accessibility standards to ensure that all citizens can access public services, information, and documents.

list.heading: Finance & Banking
list.decscription: Banks, credit unions, and financial service providers must ensure their digital platforms are accessible so that all customers can manage their finances independently.

list.heading: Retail & E-commerce
list.decscription: Online stores and marketplaces must provide accessible shopping experiences to cater to all customers, including those with disabilities.

list.heading: Legal
list.decscription: Law firms and legal services need accessible documents and websites to ensure that all clients can access legal information and services.

list.heading: Technology
list.decscription: Tech companies providing software, apps, and digital tools need to ensure that their products are accessible to users of all abilities.

list.heading: Hospitality
list.decscription: Hotels, restaurants, and travel services must ensure their websites and mobile apps are accessible for all customers, including those with disabilities.

list.heading: Non-Profit Organizations
list.decscription: NGOs and charitable organizations must make their websites and resources accessible to all, ensuring inclusivity in their outreach and services.

list.heading: Media & Entertainment
list.decscription: Broadcasting companies, streaming services, and publishers must ensure that their content and platforms are accessible to a wide audience, including those with disabilities.
